original_text:
Medicine Progress
**INSTITUTION
Patient :
**NAME[AAA , BBB] J
MRN - **ID-NUM - MPACCOMMMRN
Age :
**AGE[in 70s] years
Sex :
Male
DOB :
**DATE[Jan 13 1933]
Author :
**NAME[XXX  , WWW M]
Health Status
Summary of Hospitalization :
Pt transferred to **INSTITUTION from **INSTITUTION TCU for mental status changes .
Past Medical History :
CAD
Ischemic cardiomyopathy
Diastolic dysfunction
CHF
S/P CABG
DM
ESRD - Tues , Thurs , Sat
Hypothyroidism
Hypercholesterolemia
GERD
C-diff
Herpes Zoster
Subjective / Events Overnight :
Pt without complaints .
Physical Exam
General Appearance :
NAD .
Head :
L parotid area swelling resolved .
Cardiovascular :
IRRR .
Respiratory :
CTA .
Gastrointestinal :
Soft , NT , ND .
Genitourinary :
Foley draining light yellow urine .
Musculoskeletal :
Neg. edema ; SCD s Bilat LE .
Neurological :
AAO - to person , place , and 2007 .
Impression and Plan
Impression
Pt transferred from TCU for mental status changes .
Plan
Neuro - L post fossa extraaxial bleed 3.3 x 3.5 with mass effect on cerebellar .
As discussed with NeuroSurg , keep platelets at least 20,000 .
As discussed with Neurology , Pt can f/u in neuro clinic in a few wks .
Renal - ESRD - Currently receiving HD prn - Received it 1/19 .
As per pallative care note , " renal strongly feels further dialysis is as likely to end his life via infection as prolong it with dialysis .
I will feed this information back to the family .
Try to set up meeting - Fri , Sat , Sun ."
Heme - CML to AML - Heme C/s - On Hydrea - inc dose .
S/p Transfusion of mult. 6 pks platelets - Transfuse if &lt ; 20,000 .
Pt received HLA matched platelets .
Pallative care consult - Pt DNR / DNI with exceptions ( incl. blood and blood products ) .
Cards - Cards c/s for wide QRS , A fib controlled .
On Toprol .
Keep INR
1.3 / 1.4 - Pt is self - anticoagulated .
HEENT - Parotiditis - IV Ancef for 7 days total - completed course .
Resolving .
Dispo - Pending .
Social work c/s for SNF placement pending on decision re : HD .
Case discussed with Dr. **NAME[ZZZ] .
Professional Services
Credentials and Title of Author **NAME[VVV] Signing this Document : PA-C
Perform by **NAME[XXX  , WWW] M
( on **DATE[Jan 19 2008] 17:51 )
Sign by **NAME[XXX  , WWW] M
( on **DATE[Jan 19 2008] 17:51 )
VERIFY by **NAME[XXX  , WWW] M
( on **DATE[Jan 19 2008] 17:51 )
